subject: We are direct lenders and up
body:
We are direct lenders and up to 100% IPF (international project financing). We provide loans for business expansion, real estate investment, construction and personal loans at very low interest rate.For more information reply; 
marinerfinancepersonalloans@gmail.com

subject: Re:   We are direct lenders and up
body:
Hello! That sounds interesting. Can you tell me more about the process of applying for a loan with your company? What are the requirements and how long does it usually take to get approved?

Best wishes,
Lillie

subject: Loan Application Form Procedure
body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

The main basics of this loan procedure is carefully listed out below,I
learned this because this is the usual step which all my clients which I
have funded all followed and they all got funded respectively.

1. well after i get a quote on the amount that you are interested in
borrowing,i would send you my terms and conditions which you would be
required to agree to.

2. If you are in total agreement with my terms, you are to rightfully
inform me and I would then call the leasing agency to send you whatever
paperwork that they have for you,you would get this via email and you would
be required to fill it out and then email back to them asap.

3.we would then have to wait for them to approve us,most times they do and
when they don't then we won't be allowed to proceed with this transaction,i
have had numerous offers declined and those people may have to seek loans
elsewhere.

4..After getting that i would then proceed to the bank and deposit funds in
your bank account.


These whole processes will take three to Four (3 - 4) working days,
depending on your early response to our emails. We would need to
communicate with you to verify your provided information.

A complete form will help us process your application faster.

 1 Name:

 2 Prefix (Mr., Mrs., Ms., Dr., etc.):

 3 First name:

 4 Last name:

 5 Business name (If Any) :( Proposed name)

 6 Purpose of loan:

 7 Date of birth (yyyy-mm-dd):

 8 Gender:

 9 Marital status:

 10 City:

 11 Occupation:

 12 Company name :( if any)

 13 State/Province:

 14 Country:

 15 Phone:

 16 Amount Needed As The Loan:

 17 Duration (as stated in the above terms):

 18 Email Address


If you have a general inquiry, please complete our loan form and we will be
in contact with you within 24 business hours.  We make loans, and will
never sell or distribute your personal information.

Thank you!!

Mrs. Miranda Marquit
Loan Officer

subject: Re: Loan Application Form Procedure
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information about the loan procedure. Can you tell me more about the terms and conditions that would need to be agreed upon? Also, how long have you been working as a loan officer?

Best wishes,
Lillie

subject: Re: Loan Application Form Procedure
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information about the loan procedure. Can you tell me more about the terms and conditions that would need to be agreed upon? Also, how does the verification process work before depositing funds into the bank account?

Best wishes,
Lillie

subject: Re: Loan Application Form Procedure
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing the details of the loan procedure. It sounds like a thorough process that ensures clarity and transparency for clients. Could you please provide more information about the terms and conditions involved in this loan? I'm interested in learning more about how the funding process works and what options are available.

Best wishes,
Lillie

subject: Loan Application Form Procedure
body:
Dear Mrs. Lillie,

Thanks for your message,well i would like you to understand that i can get
you funded just as i have funded others before you,well the last 2 clients
that i funded were from the US and Trinidad and Tobago and they were both
real estate investors. Fortis Global Ventures has committed itself to serve
the underserved-from people in urban and ethnic minority communities that
many financial institutions overlook, to fledgling entrepreneurs, to
companies seeking emerging global markets. We are extending that
trailblazing spirit, actively seeking out and assisting customers with
financial needs and those who seek new financial opportunities.

These are the terms and conditions required to obtain a loan

You must be 18 or above to obtain the loan
Your loan will be given to you at an interest rate of 3%
Prepayment penalty... No
Collateral Issuing Bank... No
Guarantee collateral...No

Please your 1st monthly Repayment is to begin exactly 3  months from  the
day you get funded

Our founding principles remain... to listen to our clients first and to
earn their business by delivering superior solutions. We are compensated
only when we perform for our clients. We are rewarded for our results, not
for our advice. Join us as we continue to build long-term customer
relationships by providing an extraordinary level of service to every
client, large and small.

Once again, thank you for choosing Fortis Global Ventures as your financial
partner. We are dedicated to helping you achieve your project goals, and we
look forward to resolving any outstanding matters promptly.

If you have any questions or require further clarification, please do not
hesitate to reach out to our team

Thank you

subject: Re: Loan Application Form Procedure
body:
Hello Mrs. Lillie,

Thank you for sharing this information about Fortis Global Ventures and the funding opportunities available. It's interesting to hear about the previous clients from the US and Trinidad and Tobago who were real estate investors. 

I appreciate you outlining the terms and conditions required to obtain a loan, such as the minimum age requirement, interest rate, and repayment details. It's good to know that there are no prepayment penalties or collateral requirements.

It's also nice to see that customer service is a priority for Fortis Global Ventures, with a focus on listening to clients and delivering superior solutions. Building trust with clients is indeed important in any financial partnership.

If I may ask, how does the application process work for obtaining a loan from Fortis Global Ventures? Are there specific documents or qualifications that potential borrowers need to provide?

Thank you again for reaching out with this information. I look forward to learning more about your services.

Best wishes,
Lillie

subject: Re: Loan Application Form Procedure
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing the details of the loan procedure. It sounds like a thorough process that ensures clarity and transparency for clients. Could you please provide more information about the terms and conditions, as well as the types of loans available? I'm interested in learning more about how this process works.

Best wishes,
Lillie

body:

Best wishes,
Lillie

body:

I'm interested in learning more about the amount that can be funded and the duration of the loan. Additionally, how do you ensure the security of personal information provided during this process?
